Step_Description.Step_Description_label: From the Windows file explorer, create the D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts directory
Create a OF_Powerpoint.ppt Powerpoint file containing five slides, in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts
Create a OF_Text.txt text file in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts
Create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Unfold the "AdminContext" context in the context viewer
Click on the "Orchestra" category
In the variable viewer, add the FileSystem directory "D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts" to the "ArtefactPath" variable
In the variable viewer, add the path to "ConfdirOrchestraFramework" confdir to the "ConfigurationDirectories" variable
In the variable viewer, add the path to "ConfdirOffice" confdir to the "ConfigurationDirectories" variable
Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
In the context viewer, right click on the "AdminContext" context and select "Set as current context"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: In the context viewer, the "AdminContext" is displayed in bold. The Orchestra Explorer is empty

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the Orchestra Explorer, click on the refresh icon

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The Orchestra Explorer displays two artefact types : "Powerpoint" and "Text"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Unfold the "Powerpoint" artefact type
Get sub-artefacts
Right click on the "OF_Powerpoint" artefact and select "Get/Refresh sub-artefacts list"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "OF_Powerpoint" artefact is being unfold and the sub-hierachy of the artefact isdisplayed: it contains five sub-artefacts matching every slide of the Powerpoint artefact

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Sub-artefact properties
Right click on the first sub-artefact of the "OF_Powerpoint" artefact and select "Properties" in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "Element Properties" window pops up, showing properties of the sub-artefact: Name (1), Type (Slide), Env (FS : [D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts]), Orchestra URI (orchestra://Powerpoint/OF%5FPowerpoint/Slide/<number>)

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Collapse artefact hierarchy
Unselect any element from the OE
Click on the "-" button, in the top right corner of the Orchestra Explorer

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The Orchestra Explorer only displays artefact types

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Expand artefact hierachy
Click on the "+" button, in the top right corner of the Orchestra Explorer

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The Orchestra Explorer collapsed artefact types : The OF_Powerpoint artefact is displayed as well as its sub-artefacts, within the Powerpoint artefact type. The OF_Text artefact is displayed within the Text artefact type

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Refresh sub-artefact
Edit the "Of_Powerpoint.ppt" file and add two slides
In the Orchestra Explorer, right click on the "OF_Powerpoint" artefact and select "Get/Refresh sub-artefacts list"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "OF_Powerpoint" artefact is being unfold and the sub-hierachy of the artefact isdisplayed: it contains now seven sub-artefacts matching every slide of the Powerpoint artefact

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Create a new 'AdminContext' context
Add a path to DOORS artefacts to ArtefactPath
Right click on the 'AdminContext' context and select 'Set as current context' in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A 'DOORS' artefact type is displayed in the Orchestra Explorer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the Orchestra Explorer, unfold the DOORS artefact type

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: DOORS artefacts are displayed within the DOORS artefact type

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Right click on a DOORS artefact and select 'Get/Refresh sub-artefact list'

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: Sub-artefacts are displayed within the selected DOORS artefact

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Right click on a DOORS module within the sub-artefact list

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The entry 'Get/Refresh sub-artefact list' is available within the contextual menu
